label.code: Code from screen at disinfection station

instructions.1: Stand in front of the hand sanitizer machine at Otaniemen lukio
instructions.2: The screen should show you a code, if it doesn't, go closer
instructions.3: Type the code below and click "@:recover.label.recover"
instructions.4: Make sure you are still standing in front of the screen when you click the button
instructions.title: How to create a new account or recover a lost one?

instructions.1: Your username will be shown on the leaderboard
instructions.title: Choose a username and a password
